solution_line_template: Maddy is eating {eggs_per_day} eggs each day after school and there are {school_days_per_week} school days in a week, so she eats {eggs_per_day} x {school_days_per_week} = <<{eggs_per_day}*{school_days_per_week}={eggs_per_week}>>{eggs_per_week} eggs each week.
Since Maddy has {total_eggs} eggs / {eggs_per_week} eggs each week, they will last {weeks_last} weeks.
